entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to sign data when using pkcs11 engine for openssl with a private key stored on an HSM #92798
  • `System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests` - crashed with `Process terminated. Assertion failed.` #92793
  • [API Proposal]: EventKeywords Enum Is Missing 0x80 To Enable Activity ID's #92790
  • Test infra failure on iOS.Device.Aot.Test.WorkItemExecution CI leg #92792
  • Remove the `_obj` suffix on our CMake targets and remove the "interface" targets now that `target_link_libraries` can link to object libraries. #92787
    9.0.0
  • Atomics are missing from `GenTree::OperExceptions` #92784
    9.0.0
  • System.text.json serializes virtual property decorated with JsonPropertyName attribute twice. #92780
    Future
  • JsonException error messages include type information #92776
  • Configuration Binding Generator Initializes `decimal` Default Value Incorrectly #92773
  • Configuration Binding Generator Fails to Generate Required Method #92771
    8.0.0
  • Building .NET using mono on s390x/ppc64le includes static mono components #92770
  • CommandLine.dll: Internal assembly name doesn't match the assembly name #92767
  • JIT: LowerHWIntrinsicCreate can create illegal IR #92766
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Consider reordering loads on ARM64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92756
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 9/22/2023 12:22:36 AM #92774
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration: SYSLIB0012 Assembly.CodeBase/EscapedCodeBase is obsolete #92752

Closed

  • Linux: Instantiating a LdapConnection with a server string including a port number in .Net6.0-rc1 System.DirectoryServices.Protocols throws later an error at a SendRequest #59701
    9.0.0
  • Allow modeling ref fields in the class constructor interpreter #78681
    Future
  • `dotnet build` doesn't works, even on a bare console project #92147
  • Test falilure GC/Features/SustainedLowLatency/scenario/scenario.sh #92036
  • "dotnet nuget" results in "Internal CLR error" #92146
  • [7.0] IJW support in newer version of CMake breaks the build on empty TargetFramework #88806
    7.0.x
  • [TO VALIDATE WITH RC1] - [net7.0][mono][iOS] AOT fails for CommunityToolkit.WinUI.UI.dll #91444
    8.0.0
  • ReadOnlySpan<T>(in T) breaking changes #92693
  • [API Proposal]: High-performance, low-allocation convenience "writer" for Memory<T> #91728
  • Windows: Aborting named pipe's BeginRead/BeginWrite does not call CancelIoEx like cancelling ReadAsync's does #92757
  • Avx2 code causes AccessViolationExceptions with AVX512 available #92357
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/Multiply/MultiplyLongOps/MultiplyLongOps.cmd #92573
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods with object-param #92262
  • Deoptimization returns different versions of code when R2R is used #92616
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly way to run either AOT or JIT at runtime #84288
    Future
  • The native AOT DLL library crash failed to generate a dump or catch an exception #92687
  • CreateCertificate_MicrosoftPlatformCryptoProvider_EcdsaKey fails with The requested operation is not supported #92623
    9.0.0
  • Correlation payload not found in Build browser-wasm linux Release WasmBuildTests build leg #92732
  • [wasm] WBT - tests broken due to old skiasharp package reference #92743

PullRequests

Created

  • Move variable scope tracking code #92800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • runtime-wasm-perf: add triggers for PRs #92799
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always emit jump from hot finally block to cold target #92797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92796
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Ubuntu 16.04 amd64 queues to 22.04 #92794
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • IndentedTextWriter doesn't use indentation on the first line #92791
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Update `ryujit-overview.md` #92789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not nop-out SSA definitions in block morphing #92786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests][iOS] Fix iOS.Device.Aot.Test artifacts path #92783
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.ConvertToSingle #92779
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] Manually update release/8.0 arcade to latest #92778
    Servicing-approved, blocking-release, area-codeflow
  • [mono][ios] Apple mobile template allows passing process arguments to the runtime #92772
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reorder indirs on arm64 to make them amenable to ldp optimization #92768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use UnsafeAccessor in JSHostImplementation instead of reflection #92755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing negative/positive numbers to methods. #92754
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of object scheme #92753
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Simplify TensorPrimitives.Norm #92750
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Merged

  • Converge Representations between NativeAOT and CoreCLR #91821
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Flesh out TensorPrimitives XML docs #92749
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add more static preinitialization support #92739
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete misc unnecessary code #92764
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Account port number already included within server string #92748
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Remove Unwrap flag from UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller #92599
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Removes redundant code from `JsonCamelCaseNamingPolicy.cs` #92738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update JIT format job to pass new `--cross` argument on Linux #92751
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix link in ILLink.Tasks README.md #92769
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [llvm] Avoid zero extending non-negative constant array indexes, its … #92760
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support passing identifiers to methods #92758
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update TensorPrimitives aggregations to vectorize handling of remaining elements #92672
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Unify and clean up unspilling #91663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Promote size-wise improvements in physical promotion #92717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable SIMD intrinsics on winx64. #92673
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests failing due to an old skiasharp reference #92747
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm
  • Small refactor to BuildElement to address NRT changes #92742
    area-System.Security
  • Use P256 for PCP X.509 test #92646
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests on `main` #92741
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Move Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetAppHost off of pkgproj #92621
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use a different crossgen2 when running crossgen2 during our build than the crossgen2 that we are shipping #92677
    area-Infrastructure
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use specific version of v8 for library tests #91633
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated #92684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Define `getWasmIndirectFunctionTable` before initializing the #92683
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Make effect handling in lowering less conservative #92710
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement StoreVector64x2 and StoreVector128x2 for Arm64 #92109
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #92579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #91968
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Common.Tests.GetPrettyName_CannotRead_ReturnsNull test for root user #92695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing of valuetype scheme #92637
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Supress policheck warning in blazor-sample #92711
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix target type unsignedness detection in genFloatToIntCast() #92694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Reenable pragma suppressions for config binder gen (+ JSON) #92740
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 installed, Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\dotnet\templates\8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41.nupkg(/content/BlazorWeb-CSharp/.template.config/localize/templatestrings.cs.json)".. displays during creating project. #35768

Closed

  • There doesn't seem to be a way to execute tasks or targets for 'dotnet run' #18436
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag: handle rtm and servicing channels. #35775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0090 "'new' expression can be simplified" cleanup #35681
    untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2279393 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" cleanup #35678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --no-http-cache option #35107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • Proposal: never/bottom type #538

  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544

PullRequests

  • Expanding ref support #7555

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: adjust the plural in CS1503 #70183
    17.9
  • Collection expressions: rectify ctor check in conversions #70182
    17.9
  • NRE in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70178
  • Elide calls to immediately-spread Enumerable.ToList/ToArray #70175
  • Re-enable `.. x ? [y] : []` support in features once supported in the language #70172
  • Csc is slow when processing inheritance chain of generic types #70169
  • Can't disable visual studio block formatting without disabling formatting entirely #70168
  • dotnet build-server shutdown doesn't work on MacOs #70166
  • Cleanup DiffViewer code once editor provides an interactive diff viewer control #70165
  • CS8509 (Switch is not exhaustive): Make it smarter. #70164

Closed

  • Calls with nullable warning suppressions cannot be intercepted #70061
    17.8
  • "Convert to raw string" should work for interpolated verbatim strings #61124
    Backlog
  • Feature 'Asset synchronization' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68246
    17.8 P3
  • Variable name missing from completion after < #25572
    Backlog
  • It's possible to assign anonymous object to `IDictionary<,>`, which then throws exception #70167
  • C# Interactive should default to .NET (Core) #69813
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: use applicable EnsureCapacity() when length is known #70181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Set rollForward again #70180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check for particular collection expr attribute by name, as it can be provided internally in packages #70179
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Include sqlite binaries to enable persistent storage in vscode #70162
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler.dll` reference to C# language server #70176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Seal certain classes in LSP. #70177
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable scenario for collection expressions no longer supported in C#12 #70173
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.8] Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source #70133
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Ensure GetRelatedDocumentIds() only returns IDs for source documents #70154
    Area-IDE
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70056
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Do not restrict to type argument list context when a name could resolve to a generic and a non-generic symbol #70122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set C# InteractiveWindow default to .NET Core #70127
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Update default razor project cache file name #70156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project #51003
  • Rename the "ASP.NET Core Web App" template to "ASP.NET Core Razor Pages App" #50999
  • HeadContent treats content as static regardless of RenderMode set #50998
  • Allow streaming POST responses #50994
    .NET 9 Planning
  • WPF/Blazor Hybrid - web events not fired when Razor pages are in a separate Razor control library #50990
  • The app can't work when I create a default .Net 8 Blazor Web App and select use interactive Webassembly compoennts #50986
  • IApplicationBuilder.Map with pathMatch can not find route like it does in .net7 #50984
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextWithFilter #50982
  • Blazor Web App template fails to compile when selecting Auto, Global #50980
    8.0
  • Enhance Blazor Web .reconnect to state whether failures are due to circuit not existing so we can auto-reload page #50979
    8.0

Closed

  • DOM sync removes checkbox custom values in some cases #50995
    8.0
  • Expose AccessTokenResponse from the new BearerToken AuthenticatonHandler #49424
    8.0-rc2
  • Perf regression: plaintext #50983
  • [Blazor NET.8] Add global option for disable pre-rendering #50744
  • Blazor SSR Form submit on DOM events #50870
  • .NET 8 blazor web with RenderModeServer Issues with CascadingAuthenticationState #50951
  • @onclick and @onclick:preventDefault not working on HTML elements in new Blazor Web project (.NET 8 RC1) #50992
  • Blazor Server not disposing propertychange events. #50989
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] Fail to load local css,js with Cofoundry template. #50141
  • Plus sign `+` is lost while using QueryHelpers.Helper method for ParseQuery #50981
  • Blazor javascript isolation in different assembly #50939
  • Peristent internal 'System.Text.Json.JsonException' #50720

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2279117 #50997
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix checkbox DOM sync #50991
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • fix: cancellationTokenSource memory leak #50958
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50993
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50973
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use generated PInvokes and exchange types #50685
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Disambiguate type names by containing assembly in WellKnownTypes #50969
    area-mvc, analyzer, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update _Imports.razor to include sections namespace #49166
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid allocating FormFeature in HttpRequest.HasFormContentType #50830
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Update Selenium versions #50809
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Blazor error UI CSS, making the dismiss button visible #50846
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Support multiple claims with same type in the /manage/info response #50953
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to use dotnet-trace from sidecar on Azure Container Instances. #4217

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update from main #4272
  • Change Frozen object heap to NonGC heap in !EEHeap output #4269
    sos
  • Update release/stable with latest main #4268
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification #4254
  • Update SOS to show the relevant information for the !ThreadPool command when using the Windows thread pool #4160

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView ignores CollectionChanged events of source #17727
  • Memory leak with CarouselView #17726
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'android-arm64 #17725
  • Windows, .NET 8 RC 2, Window "blinks" when resized #17724
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Windows, .NET 8 RC 2, extra space used on title bar #17723
    .NET 8 SR1
  • .NET MAUI Blazor project template misses out on the MAUI Blazor package reference #17721
  • CollectionView.Header Pinned on Top when scrolling #17719
    Backlog
  • VS Code Mac, Output HE0031: Failed to mount developer tools on iPhone #17718
  • BlazorWebView instances never eligible for garbage collection #17717
  • Maui Rc1 and .net 7 app crashes if you have entitlements #17714
  • MAUI Blazor Windows App does not work with Native AOT #17713
  • Android App crash if the itemtemplate of CollectionView have MultiBinding #17711
  • Only first Item in CollectionView is Visible on Android #17709
  • App crash on button click in CollectionView Item #17707
    .NET 8 GA
  • SecureStorage GetAsync not working in .NET 8 MAUI #17706

Closed

  • [Intellisense][Drawing] Add BrushDesignTypeConverter #17636
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Border not clipping correctly content Image w/ Margin & custom Clip #17571
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Click the "+"/"-" button to move the cursor, and the cursor disappears #17687
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] DisplayAlert modal background is not darken #17708
  • .NET 8 RC1 - Native AOT does not work with startup Blazor MAUI App #17715
  • MAUI Android projects generate an \obj\Debug\net6.0-android\Resource.designer.cs file containing code that ends in 12k+ CS0131 Errors #17646
  • [regression/8.0.0] After switching from `net7` to `net8` build fails on `Android` #17426
    .NET 8 GA
  • Can't select MAUI project on visual studio #17480

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Add other controls to the UI tests #17728
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17640
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Bump android to latest #17720
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Override CA1822 for Android interface implementation in MauiScrollView #17691
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Update rc2 versions #17703
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2] Merge net8.0 to release rc2 branch #17704
  • [net8.0] Last merge from main to net8 for rc2 #17702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, stale, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA

    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 + Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store ValueGenerator directly in IProperty runtime annotation instead of ValueGeneratorCache #31901
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • AddCheckConstraint in model produces different output on linux vs. windows #31895
  • Referencing a third table in `JOIN` clauses #31894
  • Change Tracker GetDatabaseValues #31892
  • Concurrency Detector loses lock when multiple contexts are used in a thread. #31890
  • Enforcing usage of FluentAPI instead of attributes #31889
  • Using HasData to seed values in a new table cannot retrieve ColumnTypes #31888
  • Test: different data between between complex navs tests and complex navs shared type tests #31887
    MQ
  • json column stored foreign key for table #31886

Closed

  • Data annotations for join entity on many-to-many #31882
  • Nullable Model Differences between EF Core 6 -> EF Core 7 #30502
  • Compiled model with enum member "Cannot access private method 'ConvertToEnum'" #31827
  • FilteredInclude does not filter when using SelectMany #31697
  • Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #30589
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Mitigation for stack overflow with compiled model on Mac #31896
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891

Merged

  • Rename UseAzureSql to UseAzureSqlDefaults #31897
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30589 - Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #31856
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.10 to 7.0.11 #31848
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31885
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Handle more types of value converters in the compiled model #31861
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]ASPNETCore.app runtime version for NET8 RC2 SDK is RTM. #17421

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sdk diff exclusions #17444
  • License scanning for VMR #17442

Merged

  • Add support for loongarch64 architecture #17125
    Area-SourceBuild

Updated

  • Update input branches #17409
  • Include full path in poison report #17438
    Area-SourceBuild
